about_the_game:
A Local Co-op Zen Space Rock Demolition game.

It began with a dream of two young kids.
Demolishing space rocks to collect space dust...
...made so much better together.
Now with 14 different ships with unique abilities.
Drop in/out Local Multiplayer.
Up to 16 Player Couch Co-op. (4 Xinput + 8 Dinput + 4 Keyboard)
Playing solo? Add an AI ship to help!

Blast rocks. Don't get crushed.

A family-made game by a mom and her two kids.

Collect dust, scrap, and more to unlock new ships, modes, and game modifiers.
Pick up upgrades from fallen enemies to improve your ship.
Manage your ship's health and fuel to survive each wave.
Asteroids and ships bounce around with physics, adding to the chaos.

The starting ships:
  • The Wedge: Classic ship with average stats and a temporary shield.
  • The Sledge: Slow brute with a spread shot attack and a powerful ram ability.
  • The Feather: Agile ship with a fast split shot and the ability to stop on a dime.
  • The Friend: Sturdy with homing healing shots and repair mines that both heal allies and destroy foes.

Unlock many more!
  • Swapper 5: Transform between a rapid fire shot and a fast repairing sniper scout ship.
  • Inferno: Short range rapid fire flames to melt rocks and foes alike and a long range flamejet special.
  • Rondo: Durable with a spinning gun disc that fires homing shots in all directions. It can fire the disc as a boomerang.
  • Nock: Nimble long range sniper ship with a hyperbeam special shot.
  • Spark 7: Close range lightning strikes and good speed and a radial lightning pulse special.
  • The Gatler: Sprays shots at medium range and can unleash homing explosive rockets.
  • The Goliath: Fires homing rockets and fires many more fockets for its special.
  • Blazar: Long range sniper with a multihit lightning ball special attack.
  • Explosher: Fires a spread of rockets and can drop mines behind it to destroy large areas.
  • Razor: Highly mobile ship with dual lasers and strafing thrusters.

short_description: A Local Co-op Zen Space Rock Demolition game. Up to 16 players can play locally on a single screen, collecting space materials to unlock unique ships and upgrades, as well as new features. Drop in/out multiplayer for everyone!
